body:
Is 1.1 K/D good or bad? Thanks
Sorry if this is in the wrong category IDK where else to put it.
body_tagged:
Is 1.1 K/D good or bad? Thanks
Sorry if this is in the wrong category IDK where else to put it.
title: I just want to know. Thanks

replies.body: KD isn't really a big deal. On average a KD of about 1 is regarded as decent (normal), so 1.1 is (generally speaking) slightly above average. So you're doing pretty good :D
replies.body_tagged: KD isn't really a big deal. On average a KD of about 1 is regarded as decent (normal), so 1.1 is (generally speaking) slightly above average. So you're doing pretty good :D

replies.body: I am rockin' a K/D of .25. You go :)
replies.body_tagged: I am rockin' a K/D of .25. You go :)

replies.body: you shouldn't worry about KD, just how much you are having fun ^.^
replies.body_tagged: you shouldn't worry about KD, just how much you are having fun ^.^

replies.body: Well, i do not judge people off of KD. If it is for your own prestiee thing, then i would say its ok. I know good pvp players with lower KD than yours so KD is not really a good thing to judge people off of when it comes to pvp
replies.body_tagged: Well, i do not judge people off of KD. If it is for your own prestiee thing, then i would say its ok. I know good pvp players with lower KD than yours so KD is not really a good thing to judge people off of when it comes to pvp

replies.body: Take a look at me now! *sings* ;)
replies.body_tagged: Take a look at me now! *sings* ;)

replies.body:
Well, as others have said it really should be about how much fun you're having, so my "moral" of this reply would be try not to let a K/D get the best of you, and just have fun, but I'm sure you just want an answer to the question! :)
So, yes, a K/D of 1.0 is about average, and 1.5 and above, IMO is a good K/D, so you're sitting neatly between average and good :)
or to put it statistically, you're about a 5.5/10 for K/D :D
Hope i helped :)
